RelatedSentence: New Delhi : Even though Congress President Sonia Gandhi and Vice President Rahul Gandhi offered to resign taking responsibility for the party 's debacle in 2014 Lok Sabha elections , in typical Congress style it was outrightly rejected by the leaders .
